# Logisim PLA program table
xxxxxxxx0000 000000000100000000010010 # fetch
000000010001 000000000000001000010101 # lda get ix
000000010010 000000000000010000110001 # lda get ix ref data
000000010011 000000001000000000000010 # lda done
000000100001 000000000000001000010101 # ldb get ix
000000100010 000000000000010010010001 # ldb get ix ref data
000000100011 000000001000000000000010 # ldb done
000000110001 000000000000001000010101 # sta get ix
000000110010 000000000000010001001001 # sta set ix ref data
000000110011 000000001000000000000010 # sta done
000001000001 000000000000001000010101 # stb get ix
000001000010 000000000000010100001001 # stb set ix ref data
000001000011 000000001000000000000010 # stb done
000001010001 000000000000100000100001 # add a + b
000001010010 000000001000000000000010 # add done
